Data Fields
core_irqprio_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Core Microcontroller Access

Data structure used for setting interrupt priorities. More...

#include <core.h>

Detailed Description

This data structure is used with the I_CORE_SETIRQPRIO request to set the interrupt priority for peripherals.

Data Fields

u8 periph
 The peripheral type (see core_periph_t)
 
s8 prio
 Relative priority value – less than zero to decrease priority.
 
u8 port
 The peripheral port number (e.g. 0 for I2C0)
